description: This file defines the IOttServices interface for the OttServices plugin, exposing various functions such as ping, permissions management, and token retrieval via COMRPC in a Windows environment, using WPEFramework infrastructure.

classes.name: IOttServices
classes.description: An interface allowing remote procedure calls to OttServices functionalities such as ping, permissions management, and token retrieval.

methods.name: Ping
methods.description: Send a message to the service and receive an echo reply.

methods.name: GetPermissions
methods.description: Retrieve the permissions for a specific application as a JSON array string.

methods.name: InvalidatePermissions
methods.description: Invalidate cached permissions for a specific application.

methods.name: UpdatePermissionsCache
methods.description: Refresh and update permissions cache for a specific application.

methods.name: GetDistributorToken
methods.description: Retrieve a distributor token for a given app, possibly involving fetching xACT and SAT tokens.

methods.name: GetAuthToken
methods.description: Retrieve an authentication token for a specific app.

ctags.name: IOttServices
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IOttServices : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
